https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k8CiTL5AbP5ZF1sRTQMuKI3qQ1b.jpg Adapted from the famous O. Henry story, “The Last Leaf” and set within Vincent van Gogh’s most stunning paintings, Almond Blossoms is a magical reminder of the power of art. When young Marguerite Gachet’s mother falls ill with pneumonia, Vincent helps her weather the storm by introducing her to art and hope. Almond Blossoms
